name: FoodTapper
description:
Tapper Game

made to MiniJam 38: Food

The limitation was only use arrow keys

Soo this how works..

UP: move Up the character.. if you had food on the plate, you can trash it.

LEFT:  You can fast delete the food before catch it.

DOWN: Just move the character down.

RIGHT: If you don't have food on the plate, collect the food on your left.

IF you have food, throw it on the table on the right.

IF you angry some costumer will cost you $50

if you lose more than $0.. you end
